Posts.Content: Hello, You could check if there is a hyperthermia treatment centre near you, although the clinics may not accept her at this late stage.                                                                           My wife, with uterine cancer, I think was weakened by the chemo and radiation and then when it didn't work, she was reffered to palliative care. One of the things I recommend (when first diagnosed) is a Moss Report for treatment options - it costs $297. Some types of pancreatic cancer respond very well to hyperthermia treatment - generally in combination with low dose chemo. Best Regards to all ....
Posts.Title: Support Needed
